The lack of intelligent thought is scary. Whoever referred to Obama as a Muslim, stop drinking or smoking whatever it is that's fogging your brain cells. Then go seek mental help, because you greatly need it. SMH! Yes, both parties share part of the blame. No, nobody is perfect. Yes immigration is an issue, but it has been an issue for YEARS. And we are a land of immigrants. A path to citizenship is the logical, moral and cost effective thing to do. I'm not entirely sure what the best way to do that is, but people need to come to the table to have a rational discussion about it. It is ridiculous to think we could simply deport the HUGE number of immigrants who have made America home. The cost would be immense, and it would cause many more issues beyond those people's lives. You are not being realistic. Implement a path to citizenship and then make better policies for moving forward. Why are some of you so hateful? Do you really think illegal immigrants are what's hurting your lives? I feel sorry for you. Have a little compassion. All these people want is to be a contributing member of society and have a better life.
